website_summaries.verdict: A rolling backpack with light-up wheels for extra protection at night.
pros: Cute model that kids really like
cons: Lunch box is not as heavy-duty as the backpack

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and appears well made
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and appears to be well constructed. A little pricey but definitely better quality to the ones I bought for less. Perfect size for my 1st grader. Appears to be durable but won’t know for at least a few months. Super cute and lots of pockets. The only thing I wish it had is a pocket for a laptop but I’ll just put her laptop with the books and it will work fine. Typically a 1st grader wouldn’t have a Laptop but with the situation, distance learning spans all grades....
customer_reviews.author: Christina E.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pretty!
customer_reviews.text: It is very nicely made and good quality materials, the only thing is that it is a bit smaller than we thought. My daughter loves it though!
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Capacity and durability
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised because I'm not used to this brand. It is very well constructed. Strong sturdy material, very strong zippers and the colour is super vibrant, even better than online. My daughter loves her new bag and we were in a terrible storm so we ended up testing it for travel instead of for school. Realy convenient.
customer_reviews.author: RWM

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, not so good lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: My step-daughter LOVED this backpack. She had been asking for a rolling backpack for the past few years and we decided to get her one this year. The backpack itself looks sturdy and very nice colors, definitely does not look cheap. The lunch bag was definitely a great pair but unfortunately, the velcro on the bag ripped after about less than two months that she used it. I am glad I invested in insurance for this and was able to get her a replacement. It was the same design but the accent color (pink) was blue, which was not that much of a difference but it would have been nice to find a matching replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn Tavira

customer_reviews.title: NICE BAG
customer_reviews.text: Right size for my 8 year old to draw, she loves it especially when the wheel lights up. This replaces her disappointment from her previous school bag. the lunch bag would be better is it was a zip cause it wont stay close.
customer_reviews.author: sscampbell

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend it. Bag looks ok for now but we ...
customer_reviews.text: Took the lunch box out for the first time to use for the first day of school tomorrow and opened the Velcro and it TORE on the first time opened. Cheap material. Wouldn't recommend it. Bag looks ok for now but we haven't used it yet until tomorrow morning. After some run around customer service gave me my money back. Kids like the light on the wheels but hope the bag is sturdier than the lunchbox. Time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Made my daughter happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a month ago for my little 6 year old daughter, She's enjoying it Way easier than carrying a backpack Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Just love this backback
customer_reviews.text: Just love this backback, looks very nice, very nice materisl, well made. The lightup wheels are a plus. My daughter is just in love!! It is small, not for bigger kids with lots of books.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Backpack and lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag it is beautiful, the wheels light up, it is spacious and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Chacelle Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Totally cute!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is a second grader loves everything about her rolling back pack with her lunchbox. She said that she felt as if she was heading to the airport for a trip while looking so COOL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small. K-2d grade max
customer_reviews.text: Can't even fit 2 inches binder. Looks much bigger on the pictures then in reality
customer_reviews.author: Marina Masterova

customer_reviews.title: Super cute love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute love it, but we got it for school... The size is to small it does not fit a normal size binder... It needs to be at least 2 inches taller.. Made 9 year old was super frustrated dealing with smashing her things in all year.. Great quality just to small...
customer_reviews.author: janette poteet

customer_reviews.title: Good rolling backpack
customer_reviews.text: Good rolling backpack. A bit on the small size: after fitting 2 folders, the extra books or pencil box get harder to fit. The lunch box is ok but it tends to open if it's to heavy, a zipper one would have been better. I bought 2 sets and my girls love them, the flashing wheels are a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Ghiglione G. Natalia

customer_reviews.title: love it, perfect for my 6 yr old
customer_reviews.text: as described, love it, perfect for my 6 yr old, so that she doesn't hurt her back with heavy bags, and I didn't even knew the wheels light up! She loves it, Im happy! Good quality, seems strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Budget Fashionista

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy, great fabric and materials
customer_reviews.text: Rolling bag is a lot smaller than expected. Just barely holds enough clothes for our toddler granddaughter for a night or two away. It is very sturdy, great fabric and materials, & she likes that the wheels light up
customer_reviews.author: Mixson

customer_reviews.title: A nice school bag
customer_reviews.text: A nice school bag, my daughter loves it, but it got too soon too easily worn on the under side corner between the wheels, I guess it either needed more padding in this area or larger wheels, the front underside rubs against the floor, ground, turf and will tear apart with time.
customer_reviews.author: Dimi Pana

customer_reviews.title: 2nd grader loves it. Handle is well built, ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd grader loves it. Handle is well built, but the overall unit is a little smaller than I pictured.
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My niece really love this, I think the lunch bag needs a zipper...but still is good
customer_reviews.author: Erika S.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped lunch box
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has been good so far, but we've only had it for a few days. In the first day, the lunch box ripped upon trying to open it. My daughter is disappointed, since her twin sister's lunch box from the same company (just different print) is still in tact.
customer_reviews.author: ssj

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money bag doesn't last too long. Not even a full year and its ripping apart
customer_reviews.author: Baswell Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Color and material very good.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it's too heavy for my 5 year kid to lift when she can't stroll, but the product meets my expectations otherwise . Color and material very good.
customer_reviews.author: santosh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bag started coming apart after 2 months. Very pretty but not durable
customer_reviews.author: Kay White

customer_reviews.title: The color is cool 😎
customer_reviews.text: Is too small and they don’t said how small it is and no driscrive of the itean

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, my daughter loves it. The lighted wheels are fun and it has a lot of pockets. It's sturdy and has put up with everyday abuse.
customer_reviews.author: KtCalil

customer_reviews.title: nice but small even for a 3rd grader
customer_reviews.text: very nice...a bit small even for a 3rd grader. she will definitely not be able to use it next year.
customer_reviews.author: LMW

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Not at big as I thought ft would be. Very cute bag just wanted it to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for my 5 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the light up wheels, perfect size for kindergarten, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kerm

customer_reviews.title: Nice built except my daughter's 1 1/2 inch binder can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice built except my daughter's 1 1/2 inch binder can't fit inside without forcing it in so you can zip it up. Once the binder's in there's not much room to put other things.

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: The girl we gave this to as a gift was extremely excited with it.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice backpack which was purchased for my niece which she loved
customer_reviews.author: SGT AH64Longbow

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Child loves it & the light up wheels! Needs a little more inside space in main compartment

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this school bag, I don't know if then to use looks like very well.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack for kids. It is on the smallish side for someone reaching middle school, but it should hold everything an elementary school kid should need. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my girls ( both 9) . They love it !

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable rolling backpacks! My 6 year old granddaughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cute bag my daughter have not used it yet but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: La lonchera espantosa. Ese cierre magico o velcro se abre a cada rato. Tampoco me gusto.

customer_reviews.title: Handle is too short
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is cute, but the handle is extremely short. It was too short for my second grader to use, we ended up buying the larger version of this and the handle was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Janeth Angel

customer_reviews.title: This bag is the perfect size for a kindergartner
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size for a kindergartner!! It was everything I was looking for as far as look and functionality. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the lunch box keeps opening up no matter how many times you try to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item. My daughter join it
customer_reviews.text: Product idem to show. Excellent item. My daughter join it

customer_reviews.title: It was smaller than she thought. Cannot hold all ...
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than she thought. Cannot hold all of her school items. She loves the design just wishes it was a little larger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First grade backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought the backpack for my 6 yrs old daughter. The size is great for her, and she loved the wheels with lights. Details like sunflowers in zippers and pockets are very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Love the lights on the wheels
customer_reviews.text: Very surdy material. Love the lights on the wheels! Ok size for 1-4 graders. Will get for next year with different design.
customer_reviews.author: Joalys Marcial

customer_reviews.title: Great product but missing lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: The roller school bag's great! The wheels light up and the bag is very well made. However I didn't get the free lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ma. Diwata E. Cua

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag! Sturdy and just big enough for my first grader!!
customer_reviews.author: Esther Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Felt disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I expected the backpack to be a bit wider but it's too small. I wish I could exchange it for a bigger size. Only small books fit in it. Felt disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Odaliz

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: This rolling back is very very small. I did not expect this size. It would probably work for a prek student or Kinder not for a second grader. I was out on a trip and just came back so I did not have an opportunity to see it before. I want to return it after 30 days of purchase but it says that return time has been closed. Very disappointed! I don't have a use for it and it was very pricy did not expect this from AMAZON. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ms. P

customer_reviews.title: Super.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, so does my daughter. The blinking lights on the roller are an extra bonus.

customer_reviews.title: It has lightning wheel which will make your girls happy👍.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with this backpack. It’s arrived as scheduled.

product_meta.title: J World Lollipop Kids Rolling Backpack & Lunch Bag Set for Elementary School. Carry-On Suitcase with Wheels
product_meta.description:
The Lollipop Kids Rolling Backpack is for kids ranging from ages 3-7 and also comes with a lunch bag! This rolling backpack is soft and has noiseless wheels with a magnetic self-lighting system. Added features of this bag include a recessed three stage locking handle with a push button, tuckable air mesh cushion padded shoulder straps, and side mesh pockets for water bottles. Other fun perks are a padded grip handle, organized front pocket with pencil holder, a key fob and mesh pocket.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6 x 12.5 x 16 inches; 4 Pounds
 * Item model number :RBS-16LSP FLORET
 * Department :Unisex-child
 * Date First Available :April 4, 2015
 * Manufacturer :J World New York
 * ASIN :B00V63TL6E

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #31,216 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #160 inKids' Backpacks 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars132 ratings The Lollipop Kids Rolling Backpack is for kids ranging from ages 3-7 and also comes with a lunch bag! This rolling backpack is soft and has noiseless wheels with a magnetic self-lighting system. Added features of this bag include a recessed three stage locking handle with a push button, tuckable air mesh cushion padded shoulder straps, and side mesh pockets for water bottles. Other fun perks are a padded grip handle, organized front pocket with pencil holder, a key fob and mesh pocket.
feature_bullets: KIDS ROLLING BACKPACK & LUNCH BAG – Functions as both a bag on wheels for school and a fun carry-on backpack for kids age 3-9 years. Comes with a matching kids lunch bag
EASY TO ORGANIZE – Includes a main zippered compartment, 2 exterior zipper pockets and 2 side pockets, plus an internal organizer with key clip, pen slots and pouches for small items
INSULATED LUNCH BAG – Included lunch bag for kids keeps food at the right temperature. Holds a sandwich, drink, snack, and ice pack. Measures 10 x 8 x 4 inches
ADJUSTABLE HANDLE – Aluminum luggage handle extends to 26 or 31 inches to be easily pulled by preschoolers and kids 36 to 52 inches tall. Kids suitcase handle stores nested in bag
KID SIZE – Small enough for kids in Pre-K to 3rd grade to pull. Measures 16 x 12 x 8 inches. Fits lunch, books and a jacket. For a larger backpack with wheels, search “ J World Sundance”
